Class SearchEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.SearchEngine

  • public class SearchEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a search engine to handle genre queries with a library.
    Author:
    Yohan Chalier

        private double score(Song song)
        Average of the song score and its score in genre matching.
        Parameters:
        song - A song from the query to be scored
        Returns:
        The score of the song for the query

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<Song> search(java.lang.String query)
        Finds songs corresponding to a query and orders them by relevance
        Parameters:
        query - The search query containing a genre-like selection
        Returns:
        The order list of corresponding results.
